tokens.text: validates skin pack content and structure

title: Skin Pack
description: Validates skin pack content including skins.json structure, skin textures, capes, localization keys, and model configurations.

fields.title: Missing skins.json
fields.description: The skin pack is missing a skins.json file. This file is required and must define all skins in the pack including their textures, names, and properties.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the expected skins.json path

fields.title: Invalid JSON
fields.description: The skins.json file contains invalid JSON or does not match the expected schema. Verify JSON syntax and ensure all required properties are present.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the JSON parse error or schema violation

fields.title: Name Mismatch
fields.description: The localization_name and serialize_name properties in skins.json must have the same value. These are used for identifying the skin pack and must match.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the mismatched name values

fields.title: Duplicate Texture
fields.description: Multiple skins reference the same texture file. Each skin should use a unique texture to avoid confusion and ensure proper display.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the duplicate texture path

fields.title: Cape Size Error
fields.description: Cape textures have size restrictions. Ensure cape textures meet the required dimensions (typically 64x32 pixels).
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the cape texture path with invalid size

fields.title: Texture Size Error
fields.description: A skin or cape texture has invalid dimensions. Skin textures must be 64x64 or 128x128 pixels. Verify your texture dimensions.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the texture path and actual dimensions

fields.title: Creator Only
fields.description: A property that is only allowed for Minecraft Creator accounts was found. Non-creator accounts cannot use certain advanced skin features.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the property name not allowed

fields.title: Read Failed
fields.description: A texture file could not be read. Verify the file exists, is not corrupted, and uses a supported image format (PNG).
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the unreadable texture

fields.title: Orphan Texture
fields.description: A texture file exists in the pack but is not referenced by any skin in skins.json. Either add the skin to skins.json or remove the orphaned texture.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the orphaned texture path

fields.title: Missing Loc Key
fields.description: A localization key used in skins.json does not have a corresponding entry in the language files. Add the missing translation to your .lang files.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the missing localization key

fields.title: Unused Loc Key
fields.description: A localization entry exists in the lang file but references a key not used in skins.json. Remove unused localization entries or update skins.json.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the unused localization key

fields.title: Key Whitespace
fields.description: Localization keys must not have spaces at the beginning or end. Trim any whitespace from your localization key names.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the key with whitespace

fields.title: Invalid Model
fields.description: The skin's model target (geometry) is not recognized. Ensure the model target matches a valid player model type (slim/wide arms).
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid model target

fields.title: Too Many Skins
fields.description: The skin pack exceeds the maximum of 80 skins. Reduce the number of skins or split into multiple skin packs.

fields.title: Blank Outer
fields.description: The skin texture has blank outer areas that should contain visible content. For slim arm models, ensure the outer layer has proper pixel coverage.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the texture path with blank areas

fields.title: Invisible Angles
fields.description: The skin model geometry causes parts of the skin to be invisible from certain viewing angles. Review the model and texture alignment.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the skin name with visibility issues

fields.title: Partial Invisible
fields.description: Some parts of the skin model may not render correctly. This is a warning - review the skin appearance in-game.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the skin name with rendering issues

fields.title: Pack Not Found
fields.description: The skin pack manifest could not be associated with a valid pack structure. Verify the pack folder structure and manifest location.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the expected pack path
